 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶ֫גֶד‎</span> **noun masculine** ==excellence== (Late Hebrew ***id., choice fruit***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fruit***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***glory, honour, nobility***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> construct [[Deut.33.13|Deut 33:13]] + 4 t. [[Deut.33|Deut 33]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגָדִים‎</span> [[Song.4.13|Song 4:13]]; [[Song.7.14|Song 7:14]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגָדָיו‎</span> [[Song.4.16|Song 4:16]] — ***excellence:*** excellent or choice things; always of gifts of nature: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Deut.33.13|Deut 33:13]] i.e. (natural) gifts of heaven; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבוּאֹת שֶׁמֶשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> v[[Deut.33.14|Deut 33:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּרֶשׁ יְרָחִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> v[[Deut.33.14|Deut 33:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּבְעוֺת עוֺלָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> v[[Deut.33.15|Deut 33:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁ הַרֲרֵי קֶדֶם‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ וּמְלֹאָהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>; plural abstract <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרִי מ‎</span> (= excellent fruit) [[Song.4.13|Song 4:13]]; [[Song.4.16|Song 4:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> alone = foregoing, [[Song.7.14|Song 7:14]].
